doc:
Mike Morgan (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mike_Morgan_(actor) 0 Mike Morgan (1929 – 5 June 1958), born John Michael Pughe-Morgan, was a British actor. His film acting debut was in the 1957 film comedy Barnacle Bill, which starred Sir Alec Guinness. Morgan played a much larger role in another film with Guinness, The Horse's Mouth, as Nosey, a sidekick of Guinness's character, Gulley Jimson. However, shortly before filming ended, he fell ill with meningitis and died before the film was completed; some of his lines were therefore dubbed by another actor. Mike_Morgan ( 1929 – 5_June_1958 ) , born John_Michael_Pughe-Morgan , was a_British_actor . His_film_acting_debut was in the_1957_film_comedy_Barnacle_Bill , which starred Sir_Alec_Guinness . Morgan played a_much_larger_role in another_film with Guinness , The_Horse 's_Mouth , as Nosey , a_sidekick of Guinness 's_character , Gulley_Jimson . However , shortly before filming_ended , he fell ill with meningitis and died before the_film was_completed ; some of his_lines were_therefore_dubbed by another_actor .
